long_description: Ideal for dynamic backcountry activities in mixed weather conditions, the midweight Arc'teryx Gamma MX soft-shell jacket resists wind, rain and snow, and is highly durable. Membrane-free, air-permeable, 4-way-stretch woven fabric is laminated to a low-profile, midweight, 4-way stretch fleece. Durable Water Repellent finish beads up water so it rolls off. Lightweight polyester backing wicks moisture and provides insulation. Articulated arms and gusseted underarms allow freedom of movement. Full-length front Vislon(R) zipper is backed by a windflap. Collar height provides additional warmth; soft-brushed lining offers next-to-skin comfort. Low-profile stretch cuffs fit over or under gloves. Mesh-lined pockets breathe and provide venting; hem drawcord seals in warmth. Hand pockets, single chest pocket and laminated sleeve pocket are all zippered. The MX in the name Arc'teryx Gamma MX jacket means this is a great "mixed weather" jacket.
short_description: Ideal for dynamic backcountry activities in mixed weather conditions, the midweight Arc'teryx Gamma MX soft-shell jacket resists wind, rain and snow, and is highly durable.
